resources.string: OAT: \nThe feature %s is disabled and cannot be accessed at the moment. Enable this feature in the settings of the App.
OAT: \nInvalid password! Ensure that you typed the password correctly.
OAT: \nThe requested feature %s does not exist. Ensure that you typed the name correctly.
OAT: \nThe device is currently located at the following coordinates: %f,%f
OAT: \nThe device is now under lockdown. Trigger the unlock - feature from any trusted Contact to unlock your phone.
OAT: \nIMPORTANT: Delete the message above to keep your password secret!
